name: Honest Feelings, Kuro
text: 【CONT】 Assist All of your characters in front of this card get +X power. X is equal to 500 multiplied by the number of 《Magic》 characters in your level. 【AUTO】 [Put a 《Weapon》 character from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose a cost 0 or lower character in your opponent's center stage, and put it on the top of his or her deck.
flavorText: …Thank you.

name: Wish You Want to Fulfill, Kuro
text: 【CONT】 If the number of cards named "Behind the Lies and Strong Front" in your waiting room is three or more, this card gets -1 level while in your hand. 【CONT】 Experience If the total level of the cards in your level is four or higher, this card gets +1000 power. 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may put the top card of your clock into your waiting room.
flavorText: Return me to where I belong…

name: Sweets Battle Outbreak! Kuro
text: 【AUTO】 When your other 《Magic》 character or character with "Mimi(美々)" in its card name attacks, this card gets +1000 power until end of turn. 【AUTO】 [(1) Put a card from the top of your deck into your clock] When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose a 《Magic》 character or character with "Shirou(士郎)" in its card name from your waiting room, and return it to your hand.
flavorText: Seems like it'll taste ridiculous, as suits you, so it sounds perfect.

name: Temporary Retreat, Kuro
text: 【AUTO】 At the beginning of your opponent's attack phase, you may put the top card of your deck into your waiting room. If that card is a 《Magic》 character, you may move this card to an open position of your center stage.
flavorText: I can't really fight like this, a shame.

name: Another “Illya”, Kuro
text: 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, if the number of cards in your stock is two or less, put this card into your waiting room.
flavorText: You're throwing a tantrum like a child.

name: “Flame Burst, seven-fold” Luvia
text: 【AUTO】 [(3) Put a 《Jewel》 character from your hand into your waiting room] When this card attacks, if you have another card named "“Gale Burst, five-fold” Rin" in your center stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, deal seven damage to your opponent. (This damage may be canceled)
flavorText: Sign!

name: “Miracle”? Kuro
text: 【AUTO】 [【REST】 one of your other 【STAND】 《Magic》 characters] When this card attacks, if a card named "Mana Resupply" is in your climax area, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose a 《Magic》 character in your waiting room, put it into your stock, and this card gets +4000 power until end of turn.
flavorText: You're all going to kiss me once a day.

name: “Gale Burst, five-fold” Rin
text: 【CONT】 All of your other characters get the following ability. "【CONT】 This card cannot side attack." 【CONT】 Experience If the total level of the cards in your level is three or higher, this card gets +1000 power.
flavorText: Set!

name: Kaleido Ruby, Rin
text: 【CONT】 Your other character in the middle position of your center stage gets +500 power. 【ACT】 [(2) 【REST】 this card] Choose a character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand.
flavorText: Now, then… Shall we get this show started?

name: Luvia in Regular Clothes
text: 【AUTO】 When this card becomes 【REVERSE】, if this card's battle opponent is level 0 or lower, you may 【REVERSE】 that character. 【ACT】 [(1)] Choose one of your 《Jewel》 characters, and that character gets +1500 power and 《Maid》 until end of turn.
flavorText: Miyu, it seems you've learned how to prepare tea.

name: Kuro All Ready for Gym
text: 【AUTO】 When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, you may put the top card of your deck into your stock. 【AUTO】 When this card becomes 【REVERSE】 in battle, your opponent may put the top card of your opponent's deck into his or her stock.
flavorText: …Four gods? Where's the White Tiger?

name: A Maid's Job, Rin
text: 【AUTO】 [(1) Put the top card of your deck into your clock] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose a 《Jewel》 character in your waiting room, return it to your hand, and this card gets +1500 power until end of turn.
flavorText: Leave it to me.

name: In a Pinch! Kuro
text: 【CONT】 During this card's battle, you cannot play event cards and "Backup" from your hand.
flavorText: …Ha!?

name: Rin in Uniform
text: 【AUTO】 When your other character becomes 【REVERSE】 in battle, choose one of your characters, and that character gets +1000 power until end of turn. 【ACT】 [(1)] Choose one of your characters with "Illya(イリヤ)"in its card name, and that character gets the following ability until end of turn. "【AUTO】 When this card becomes 【REVERSE】, if the level of this card's battle opponent is lower than or equal to the level of this card, you may 【REVERSE】 that character."
flavorText: Yes. I'm a Japanese woman who values harmony.

name: Former Master, Rin
text: 【CONT】 This card gets +1500 power for each of your other cards named "Former Master, Luvia", and the character facing this card gets +1 soul.
flavorText: What do you think you're doing～～～

name: Former Master, Luvia
text: 【CONT】 This card gets +1500 power for each of your other cards named "Former Master, Rin", and the character facing this card gets +1 soul.
flavorText: Ruby: "We wouldn't want to get caught up in their fight, after all."

name: “Shared Pain” Kuro
text: 【AUTO】 When your opponent levels up, put this card into your waiting room.
flavorText: I at least have to!

name: Homurabara Academy Student, Kuro
text: 【ACT】 【COUNTER】 Backup 1500, Level 1 [Put this card from your hand into your waiting room] (Choose one of your characters that is being frontal attacked, and that character gets +1500 power until end of turn)
flavorText: What? You aren't happy with the taste?

name: Domineering Princess, Luvia
text: 【AUTO】 When this card becomes 【REVERSE】, if this card's battle opponent is level 1 or lower, you may 【REVERSE】 that character.
flavorText: Alone, we probably wouldn't have been able to win.

name: School Nursing, Karen
text: 【CONT】 If the number of cards in your opponent's clock is four or more, this card gets +1000 power.
flavorText: …What? Did one of your organs fall out?

name: Kaleido Sapphire, Luvia
flavorText: My qualifications as a wielder must really be…

name: Top Candidate of Clock Tower, Rin
text: 【CONT】 For each of your other 《Jewel》 characters, this card gets +500 power. 【AUTO】 Encore [Put the top card of your deck into your clock] (When this card is put into your waiting room from the stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, return this card to its previous stage position as 【REST】)
flavorText: I know we're the ones who involved you in this, but I'm glad you were there.

name: Sealing Designation Enforcer, Bazett
text: 【AUTO】 [(5)] When a climax is placed on your opponent's climax area, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose a character facing this card, and put it into your opponent's waiting room.
flavorText: Ruby: "Her name is Bazett Fraga McRemitz."

name: Luvia in Uniform
text: 【CONT】 Experience If the total level of the cards in your level is five or higher, this card gets +1500 power. 【AUTO】 Encore [Put the top card of your deck into your clock] (When this card is put into your waiting room from the stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, return this card to its previous stage position as 【REST】)
flavorText: Kuro: "Is that so much to grant me?"

name: Mana Resupply
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul. (【COME BACK】: When this card triggers, you may choose a character from your waiting room, and return it to your hand.)
flavorText: Miyu: "Mmm?"

name: Behind the Lies and Strong Front
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on your climax area from your hand, draw a card, choose one of your characters, and that character gets +2000 power and +1 soul until end of turn.
flavorText: Illya: "Grant your own wishes!"

name: “Necessity”? Illya
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, look at the top card of your deck, and put it on the top or the bottom of your deck. 【AUTO】 [(1) Put a card from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is put into your waiting room from the stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, search your deck for up to one 《Magic》 character, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck.
flavorText: I won't give up my spot as the older sister!

name: Ties That Bind, Miyu
text: 【AUTO】 [Put this card into your waiting room] When another of your characters with "Illya(イリヤ)" in its card name is frontal attacked, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose one of your characters in battle, and that character gets +1500 power until end of turn. 【AUTO】 Bond/"Usual Scenery, Illya" [(1)] (When this card is played and placed on stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose a card named "Usual Scenery, Illya" in your waiting room, and return it to your hand.)
flavorText: If you want a reason… I have one.

name: Something to Protect, Miyu
text: 【CONT】 If a card named "In a Pinch! Illya" is in your clock, this card gets -1 level while in your hand. 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, if a card named "Class Card, Rider" is in your climax area, until end of turn, this card gets +3000 power and your opponent cannot play event cards and "Backup" from his or her hand. 【AUTO】 At the beginning of your opponent's draw phase, if this card is in your center stage, choose one of your characters, and that character gets +4000 power until end of turn.
flavorText: Don't worry. Leave the rest to me.

name: “Kaleidoscope” Illya
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand or by a "Change" effect, draw up to two cards, choose a card in your hand, and put it into your waiting room. 【AUTO】 [Put a card named "Class Card, Saber" from your hand into your waiting room] When a card named "Class Card, Saber" is placed on your climax area, if you have another card named "“Kaleidoscope” Miyu", put the top card of your deck into your waiting room. If that card is level 1 or lower, you may pay the cost. If you do, all of your characters get the following ability until end of turn. "【AUTO】 When this card attacks, deal one damage to your opponent." (Climax are regarded as level 0. This damage may be canceled)
flavorText: I want to help Miyu, just like she helped me!

name: “Kaleidoscope” Miyu
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand or by a "Change" effect, look at up to X cards from the top of your deck, choose up to one card from among them, and put it into your hand. Put the rest into your waiting room. X is equal to the number of your 《Magic》 characters. 【AUTO】 When a card named "Class Card, Saber" is placed on your climax area, if this card is in your center stage, draw a card, until end of turn, this card gets +1500 power and the following ability. "【AUTO】 When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, you may put that character on the bottom of your opponent's deck."
flavorText: She was the first one…The first one to call me a friend…

name: Usual Scenery, Illya
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, look at up to six cards from the top of your deck, choose three cards from among them, and put them into your waiting room. Put the rest on the top of your deck in any order. 【AUTO】 [(1) Put a card from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, put up to one card from the top of your clock into your waiting room, and this card gets +1000 power until end of turn.
flavorText: Everything I thought might have been lost yesterday was here… next to me again, today.

name: In a Pinch! Illya
text: 【CONT】 Your other character in the middle position of your center stage gets +500 power and "【AUTO】 Encore [Put a character from your hand into your waiting room]". 【ACT】 [(1) Put the top card of your deck into your clock & 【REST】 this card] Choose one of your opponent's characters. That character cannot 【STAND】 during your opponent's next stand phase.
flavorText: Ruby!?

name: Magical Stick, Ruby
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, look at up to two cards from the top of your deck, and put them on the top of your deck in any order.
flavorText: Illya: "Hey, are you really a magic stick…?"

name: A Maid's Job, Miyu
text: 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, if the number of cards in your hand is five or more, choose one of your 《Magic》 characters, and that character gets +1500 power until end of turn.
flavorText: Ｈa, haa…

name: “Coincidence”? Miyu
text: 【CONT】 Experience If the total level of the cards in your level is two or higher, this card gets +X power. X is equal to 1000 multiplied by the level of the character facing this card. 【AUTO】 Encore [Put the top card of your deck into your clock] (When this card is put into your waiting room from the stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, return this card to its previous stage position as 【REST】)
flavorText: That's okay. It doesn't bother me. Actually…

name: Kaleido Magical Girl, Illya
text: 【CONT】 Experience If the total level of the cards in your level is two or higher, this card gets +1000 power.
flavorText: It seems a bit brutal, but I think I'm starting to feel more like a magical girl!

name: Perfect Super-human? Miyu
text: 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, if a blue climax is in your climax area, draw a card, choose a card in your hand, and put it into your waiting room.
flavorText: She's flying…

name: Maid Outfit Miyu
text: 【AUTO】 When you use this card's "Backup", choose one of your characters in battle, and that character gets +X power until end of turn. X is equal to 500 multiplied by the number of characters you have with "Illya(イリヤ)" or "Miyu(美遊)" in its card name. 【ACT】 【COUNTER】 Backup 500, Level 1 [(1) Put this card from your hand into your waiting room] (Choose one of your characters that is being frontal attacked, and that character gets +500 power until end of turn)
flavorText: You didn't mean any harm, Illyasviel…

name: Swimsuit Illya & Miyu
text: 【AUTO】 Experience When you use this card's "Backup", if the total level of the cards in your level is five or higher, choose one of your characters in battle, and that character gets +1000 power until end of turn. 【ACT】 【COUNTER】 Backup 2500, Level 2 [(1) Put this card from your hand into your waiting room] (Choose one of your characters that is being frontal attacked, and that character gets +2500 power until end of turn)
flavorText: Illya: "After all, it's summer! Summer!!"

name: Dreamy Girl, Illya
text: 【CONT】 Assist All of your characters in front of this card get +1000 power. 【CONT】 Experience If the total level of the cards in your level is three or higher, your other character in the middle position of the center stage gets +500 power. 【AUTO】 Change [(1) Put this card into your waiting room] At the beginning of your draw phase, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose a card named "“Kaleidoscope” Illya" in your waiting room, and put it on the stage position that this card was on.
flavorText: Well… in other words, isn't it like this? Don't think! Imagine!

name: Big Bath at Luvia's Mansion, Miyu
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, if the number of cards in your deck is five or less, return all cards in your waiting room to your deck. If you do, shuffle your deck, choose one of your characters, and that character gets +3000 power until the end of your opponent's next turn. 【ACT】 [(2) 【REST】 two of your characters] Draw a card.
flavorText: Kuro: "You erased my existence, and you never gave me a family, a home, friends, or anything normal…"

name: To Protect Daily Life, Illya
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, draw up to one card, choose up to one cost 1 or lower character in your hand, and put it on any position of your stage. 【AUTO】 [(3) Return this card to your hand] When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, if a card named "Another Me" is in your climax area, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose up to one card named "Wish You Want to Fulfill, Kuro" in your hand, and put it on the stage position that this card was on.
flavorText: Reach… Please!

name: Practicing Magic, Illya
text: 【AUTO】 Bond/"Perfect Super-human? Miyu" [(1)] (When this card is played and placed on stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose a card named "Perfect Super-human? Miyu" in your waiting room, and return it to your hand.) 【ACT】 [(1) 【REST】 this card] Choose one of your characters with "Miyu(美遊)" in its card name, and that card gets +500 power until the end of turn.
flavorText: Source? Oh… in that case…

name: Worst Luck!? Illya
text: 【CONT】 If the number of cards in your hand is four or more, all of your other characters get +1500 power.
flavorText:
Miyu: "Illya! What happened to you!?"
Illya: "G-Good morning…"

name: “Big Bro” Shirou
text: 【CONT】 During your opponent's turn, all of your other characters get +500 power. 【AUTO】 [(1) Put a card from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, search your deck for up to one character with "Experience", reveal it to your opponent, put it into youｒ hand and shuffle your deck. (youとrの間のスペースを消してください。）
flavorText: She's Illya's cousin!?

name: Kaleido Magical Girl, Miyu
text: 【CONT】 Your other character in the middle position of your center stage gets +500 power. 【ACT】 Brainstorm [(1) 【REST】 two of your characters] Reveal four cards from the top of your deck, and put them into your waiting room. For each climax revealed, draw up to one card.
flavorText: Retrieval complete…

name: “Promise” Illya
text: 【CONT】 If the number of cards in your hand is six or more, this card gets +1500 power.
flavorText: If you abandon your friends, you can't move forward.

name: Sudden Transfer Student, Miyu
text: 【CONT】 If you do not have any other characters in your center stage, this card gets +1000 power and "【AUTO】 Encore [Put a character from your hand into your waiting room]".
flavorText: I'm Miyu Edelfelt.

name: Normal Girl, Illya
text: 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, if a card named "Birth of A Magical Girl!!" is in your climax area, put the top two cards of your deck into your waiting room. If all those cards are 《Magic》 characters, draw a card.
flavorText: Oh～ Big bro, want to race home?

name: Homurabara Academy Student, Miyu
text: 【AUTO】 This ability activates up to two times per turn. When another of your 《Magic》 characters is placed on the stage from your hand, this card gets +1000 power until end of turn.
flavorText: …What's wrong, Illya?

name: Mission Failed!? Miyu
text: 【ACT】 Brainstorm [(1)] Reveal four cards from the top of your deck, and put them into your waiting room. For each climax revealed, choose one of your 《Magic》 characters, and that character gets +2000 power until end of turn.
flavorText: She got away!?

name: Cooking is Love, Illya
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, reveal the top card of your deck. If that card is not a 《Magic》 character, put it into your clock. (If it is, return the revealed card to its original place)
flavorText: Okay, to the oven!!

name: Illya Being Toyed Around With
text: 【AUTO】 When a card named "Another Me" is placed on your climax area, if this card is in your center stage, search your deck for up to one card named "Another “Illya”, Kuro", put it on any position of your stage, and shuffle your deck.
flavorText: I-I am a child! And so are you!

name: Sign of Closeness, Leys
text: 【CONT】 Experience If a card named "Trainer, Sella" is in your level, this card gets +1500 power.4
flavorText: Guten Morgen.

name: “Mama” Irisviel
text: 【CONT】 Assist All of your characters in front of this card get +X power. X is equal to 500 multiplied by that character's level. 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, draw a card, choose a card in your hand, and put it into your waiting room.
flavorText: Good morning.

name: Magical Stick, Sapphire
text: 【CONT】 All of your other 《Magic》 characters get +500 power and "【AUTO】 Encore [Put a character from your hand into your waiting room]".
flavorText: To translate, both of them were informed that neither could return to the Mage's Association until they learned to cooperate.

name: Trainer, Sella
text: 【CONT】 Experience If the total level of the cards in your level is five or higher, all of your other characters get +1000 power.
flavorText: I always knew you'd do that one day!

name: At the End of the Night, Illya
text: 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, if a card named "Class Card, Archer" is in your climax area, this card gets the following ability until the end of your opponent's next turn. "【CONT】 This card gets +X power. X is equal to 1500 multiplied by the level of the character facing this card."
flavorText: …Wh-What?

name: Realistic Miyu
text: 【AUTO】 Encore [Put the top card of your deck into your clock] (When this card is put into your waiting room from the stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, return this card to its previous stage position as 【REST】) 【AUTO】 Change [Put this card into your waiting room] At the beginning of your draw phase, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose a card named "“Kaleidoscope” Miyu" in your waiting room, and put it on the stage position that this card was on.
flavorText: No… it's probably impossible…

name: “Friend” Illya & Miyu
text: 【CONT】 This card gets +1000 power for each of your other cards named "“Friend” Illya & Miyu". 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may put the top card of your clock into your waiting room.
flavorText:
Illya: "We can do anything… If we're together!"
Miyu: "Yes, let's move forward."

name: Magical Sapphire
text: 【CONT】 If the number of cards in your hand is five or more, all of your other characters get +500 power. 【CONT】 If you would pay the 【ACT】 cost for one of your characters in your hand or stage, you may put a marker from underneath this card into your waiting room instead of a card from your stock. 【AUTO】 [【REST】 two of your 【STAND】 characters] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, put the top card of your deck underneath this card as a marker.
flavorText: But what is the source for that image?

name: Einzbern Family, Sella & Leys
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, choose one of your other 《Master》 characters, and that character gets +1000 power until the end of your opponent's next turn.
flavorText:
Leys: "Yup, you worry too much, Sella."
Sella: "You just care too little!"

name: Classmate, Mimi
text: 【AUTO】 When this card becomes 【REVERSE】 in battle, reveal the top card of your deck. If that card is level 2 or higher, you may return this card to your hand. (Climax are regarded as level 0. The revealed card is returned to its original place)
flavorText: Yours is good, as well, Nanaki.

name: “Mama's Intuition” Irisviel
text: 【AUTO】 [Put a character with "Kuro(クロ)" in its card name from your stage into your clock] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, search your deck for up to one character with "Illya(イリヤ)" in its card name, reveal it to your opponent, put it into youｒ hand and shuffle your deck.
flavorText: It's kind of vague, but-

name: Miyu in Regular Clothes
flavorText: This absurd act ignores aerodynamics. Not to mention gravity, inertia, and the third law of motion…

name: Classmate, Suzuka
text: 【AUTO】 When this card becomes 【REVERSE】 in battle, put this card on the bottom of your deck.
flavorText: My, my. Did you see that, Nanaki.

name: Magical Ruby
text: 【AUTO】 [Put a 《Jewel》 character from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, search your deck for up to one 《Master》 character, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck. 【ACT】 [Put a climax from your hand into your waiting room] Choose one of your characters, and that character gets +1500 power until the end of your opponent's next turn.
flavorText: You there, how would you like to become a magical girl?

name: “Belief” Miyu
text: 【CONT】 If the number of cards in your hand is six or more, this card gets +1500 power. 【AUTO】 [Put the top card of your deck into your clock] When this card attacks, if a card named "Class Card, Lancer" is in your climax area, you may pay the cost. If you do, draw a card, and this card gets +1000 power until end of turn.
flavorText: Together, we can accomplish things we couldn't alone.

name: After School with Friends, Illya
text: 【CONT】 All of your other cards named "After School with Friends, Illya" and "After School with Friends, Miyu" get +1000 power.
flavorText: …Ah～?

name: After School with Friends, Miyu
text: 【CONT】 All of your other cards named "After School with Friends, Illya" and "After School with Friends, Miyu" get +1000 power.
flavorText: …Ah～.

name: Guided Fate, Illya
text: 【ACT】 [Put a 《Magic》 character from your hand into your waiting room] Reveal the top card of your deck. If that card is level 0 or lower, this card gets the following ability until end of turn. "【CONT】 When this card attacks, you may instead choose a character on your opponent's back stage, and have this card frontal attack with the chosen character as the defending character." (Climax are regarded as level 0. The revealed card is returned to its original place)
flavorText: Get on!!

name: Homeroom Teacher, Taiga
text: 【CONT】 This card gets +1000 power for each of your other cards named "“Big Bro” Shirou".

name: “Saber” Install, Miyu
text: 【CONT】 This card gets +1 level and +2500 power for each marker underneath this card. 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, choose up to one climax in your hand, reveal it to your opponent, and put it face down underneath this card as a marker.
flavorText: Kuro: "Impressive, Miyu."

name: Illya in Pajamas
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, this card gets -1500 power until end of turn. 【AUTO】 Encore [Put a character from your hand into your waiting room] (When this card is put into your waiting room from the stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, return this card to its previous stage position as 【REST】)
flavorText: Huh～ Even though it isn't a cold～～

name: Classmate, Tatsuko
text: 【AUTO】 When this card becomes 【REVERSE】 in battle, your opponent may draw a card.
flavorText: Eh heh.

name: Lovestruck Miyu
text: 【CONT】 If all of your characters have "Illya(イリヤ)" or "Miyu(美遊)" in its card name, this card gets +2000 power.
flavorText: You're the only friend in my life, Illya. No one else matters, right?

name: Big Bath at Luvia's Mansion, Illya
text: 【AUTO】 [(1) Put the top card of your deck into your clock & Put a card from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose one of your opponent's level 3 or lower characters in the back stage, and put it on the bottom of his or her deck.
flavorText: It was a close call, but we managed to play it off…

name: Classmate, Nanaki
text: 【AUTO】 This ability activates up to one time per turn. When one of your characters is put into your waiting room from your hand, this card gets +1500 power until end of turn.
flavorText: Here's some in return, Mimi.

name: Class Card, Saber
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul. (【GATE】: When this card triggers, you may choose 1 climax in your waiting room, and return it to your hand)
flavorText: With all my power… Today, I will end this here!

name: Another Me
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul. (【GATE】: When this card triggers, you may choose 1 climax in your waiting room, and return it to your hand)
flavorText: Yes, something was different today…

name: Birth of A Magical Girl!!
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on your climax area from your hand, draw a card, choose one of your characters, and that character gets +2000 power and +1 soul until end of turn.
flavorText: Ruby: "The brand new Kaleid Liner, Prisma Illya is born!"

name: Class Card, Archer
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on your climax area from your hand, choose up to one blue card in your waiting room, put it into your stock, and all of your characters get +1 soul until end of turn.
flavorText: Install…

name: Class Card, Lancer
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul. (【DRAW】: When this card triggers, you may draw 1 card)
flavorText: Lancer Include…!!

name: Class Card, Rider
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul. (【DRAW】: When this card triggers, you may draw 1 card)
flavorText: Bellero…phon!

name: Holiday Together with Friends, Illya
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, look at the top card of your deck, and put it on the top or the bottom of your deck.
flavorText: Thanks, Miyu.

name: Yearning for Summer Vacation
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul. (【COME BACK】: When this card triggers, you may choose a character from your waiting room, and return it to your hand.)
